EmailTemplate.description: Triggers an email when someone is added to the Meeting Team in Mercury. Only for Internal Mercury Users, not Sales Reps.
EmailTemplate.name: New Team Member Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting Team Confirmation: {!Team_Member_MERC__c.Meeting_MERC__c}, {!Meeting_MERC__c.Date_of_Event_MERC__c} - {!Meeting_MERC__c.End_Date_of_Event_MERC__c}
